content.prompt: A library of e-books contains metadata for each book. The metadata are intended to help a search feature find books that users are interested in. Which of the following is LEAST likely to be contained in the metadata of each e-book?

choices.label: An archive containing previous versions of the e-book
The author and title of the e-book
The date the e-book was first published
The genre of the e-book (e.g., comedy, fantasy, romance, etc.)

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how knowledge can be generated from data.
